Divine Character.quote: "God is light; in him there is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Divine Expression.quote: "As a man acts, so does he become." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 4.4.5)

Divine Consciousness.quote: "I am the consciousness that resides in all beings." (Bhagavad Gita 10:20)

Divine Will.quote: "Not my will, but yours be done." (Luke 22:42)

Divine Temperament.quote: "The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love." (Psalm 103:8)

Divine Moods.quote: "My love and my wrath are both aspects of my mercy." (Hadith Qudsi)

Divine Behavior.quote: "Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect." (Matthew 5:48)

Divine Emotions.quote: "For the Lord your God is a consuming fire, a jealous God." (Deuteronomy 4:24)

Divine Intelligence.quote: "O Lord, how manifold are your works! In wisdom you have made them all." (Psalm 104:24)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "The Tao gives birth to all beings, nourishes them, maintains them." (Tao Te Ching 51)

Divine Mind.quote: "For who has known the mind of the Lord?" (Romans 11:34)

Divine Heart.quote: "I have loved you with an everlasting love." (Jeremiah 31:3)

Divine Spirit.quote: "God is spirit, and his worshipers must worship in spirit and in truth." (John 4:24)

Divine Presence.quote: "Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence?" (Psalm 139:7)

Divine Voice.quote: "Be still, and know that I am God." (Psalm 46:10)

Divine Communication.quote: "In the past God spoke to our ancestors through the prophets... but in these last days he has spoken to us by his Son." (Hebrews 1:1-2)

Divine Authority.quote: "All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me." (Matthew 28:18)

Divine Leadership.quote: "The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing." (Psalm 23:1)

Divine Spontaneity.quote: "The wind blows wherever it pleases... So it is with everyone born of the Spirit." (John 3:8)

Divine Creativity.quote: "See, I am making all things new." (Revelation 21:5)

Divine Response.quote: "Call to me and I will answer you." (Jeremiah 33:3)

Divine Interaction.quote: "Draw near to God and He will draw near to you." (James 4:8)

Divine Experience.quote: "Taste and see that the Lord is good." (Psalm 34:8)

Divine Attitude.quote: "For I know the plans I have for you, plans to prosper you and not to harm you." (Jeremiah 29:11)

Divine Disposition.quote: "The Lord delights in those who fear him, who put their hope in his unfailing love." (Psalm 147:11)

Divine Traits.quote: "I am gentle and humble in heart." (Matthew 11:29)

Divine Characteristics.quote: "Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights, who does not change like shifting shadows." (James 1:17)

Divine Nature.quote: "In him we live and move and have our being." (Acts 17:28)
